definition: meat/flesh/pulp (of a fruit)/(coll.) (of a fruit) squashy/(of a person) flabby/irresolute/Kangxi radical 130
tip/end/final stage/latter part/inessential detail/powder/dust/opera role of old man

sentences.english: Eringi Cream White Sauce Spaghetti with minced meat.
sentences.chinese: 杏鮑菇肉末忌廉白汁意麪條。

sentences.english: The salty variety is filled with minced meat, vegetables etc.
sentences.chinese: 鹹餡則可以由碎肉末，菜蔬等做成。

sentences.english: Can also use bacon instead of minced meat.
sentences.chinese: 也可以用鹹肉代替肉末。

sentences.english: We have roast Peking duck, "Ma por"bean curd, and braised sea cucumber with minced meat.
sentences.chinese: 我們有北京烤鴨，麻婆豆腐和肉末燒海蔘。

sentences.english: Grate garlic and add it into the mincemeat.
sentences.chinese: 將大蒜磨碎，加到肉末裏。

sentences.english: Brown the mince in a frying pan.
sentences.chinese: 在煎鍋裏把肉末煎至棕色。

sentences.english: Pavlov discovered that when dogs were fed meat powder they salivated .
sentences.chinese: 巴甫洛夫發現當餵狗喫肉末的時候它們就留口水。

sentences.english: You can use honey, molasses, and minced dried fruits for sweetening .
sentences.chinese: 您可以使用蜂蜜，糖漿，和肉末乾果的甜味劑。

sentences.english: Christmas dinner is usually a Roast Turkey with Christmas pudding and mince pies for dessert.
sentences.chinese: 聖誕大餐通常是一隻帶有布丁的烤火雞與肉末甜點。
